lines.text: Wonderful. Bust, 83 cm. Will expand when unwrapped.
Hikaru, go away! Don't try to rescue me! It's too dangerous!
When have I ever obeyed orders like that?
[Shammy has caught Capt. Global trying to light his pipe]
Captain, there's no smoking on the bridge!

[quickly puts his match away]
Oh, of course not, Shammy. I was just holding it.
